question:
Which of the following projects have been clubbed with the Integrated Development of Wildlife Habitats (IDWH) scheme?
  1. Project Elephant
  2. Project Tiger
  3. Project Snow Leopard
  4. Project Bustard
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Centrally-sponsored Project Bustard, Project Snow Leopard, Project Tiger and Project Elephant have been clubbed with the Integrated Development of Wildlife Habitats (IDWH) scheme.
